__README__: This is a template file. Copy this to project_map.json and customize with your real content.

Mercury.title: Your Name — Quick Start Project
Mercury.short: A brief, catchy one-line description of this project (1-2 sentences max)
Mercury.long: A more detailed description of this project. Explain what you built, what technologies you used, what problems you solved, and what you learned. Keep it professional but engaging.

projects.name: Sub-project or Feature Name
projects.description: What this specific feature or component does

Venus.title: Venus — Creative Design Project
Venus.short: UI/UX design project showcasing modern web design principles
Venus.long: Description of your design-focused project. Talk about the design process, user research, prototyping, and final implementation.

projects.name: Design System
projects.description: Custom design system with reusable components

Earth.title: Your Full Name — Portfolio Hub
Earth.short: Full-stack developer passionate about creating innovative web experiences
Earth.long: This is your main introduction. Write about yourself: your background, your passion for technology, your key skills, and what drives you as a developer. Make it personal and authentic. Example: 'I'm a full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I specialize in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. I'm passionate about creating user-centered experiences that solve real problems.'

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration

projects.description: WebSocket-based chat application with rooms and DMs

projects.name: AI Content Generator
projects.description: Machine learning powered content creation tool

Mars.title: Mars — Technical Innovation Project
Mars.short: Cutting-edge technical project pushing the boundaries of web development
Mars.long: Describe your most technically challenging project. What problem did it solve? What innovative approaches did you take? What technologies did you experiment with? What did you learn from the challenges?

Jupiter.title: Jupiter — Large-Scale Project
Jupiter.short: Massive project showcasing enterprise-level development skills
Jupiter.long: Your biggest, most complex project. Talk about scale, team collaboration, architecture decisions, deployment strategies, and the impact it had. Show your ability to handle large codebases and complex systems.

projects.name: Enterprise SaaS Platform
projects.description: Multi-tenant SaaS with advanced analytics and reporting

Saturn.title: Saturn — Creative/Experimental Project
Saturn.short: Experimental project showcasing creativity and artistic coding
Saturn.long: Your most creative or experimental project. This could be a game, an interactive art piece, a creative tool, or any project where you pushed creative boundaries. Talk about the creative process and technical implementation.

tips: Keep 'short' descriptions under 2 sentences for readability
Make 'long' descriptions 2-4 paragraphs with specific achievements
Include metrics where possible (e.g., '50% faster', '10k users')
Add working links - broken links look unprofessional
Use consistent formatting across all entries
Be honest - showcase real projects you're proud of
Update regularly as you complete new projects
